title: How hard is it to make money on Fiverr? - Quora

response.answer_text: In Quantum Physics, a sub-atomic particle can be present and absent at the same time.  In Fiverr, making money can be easy and hard at the same time.  Confused? Let me explain. Making money on Fiverr is almost like going to the gym you know. Very hard at first and then…pretty easy.  You see, when you’re new at the platform, you’re bombarded with so much competition that it’s really easy to give up. Depending on what you’re good at, it’s a really crowded place.  I’ve been a content writer and copywriter at the platform for over 2 years with a Level One Profile and a 5 star rating… but let me tell you… almost anyone can do copy-writing these days using apps and websites such as Grammarly to help them (if you wanted to be a copywriter, download Grammarly it will make you life much, much easier. Welcome!) You might want to do something that’s more on demand or mainstream, such as logo designing… but yes, Fiverr is also flooded with logo designers and websites such as canva and Wix logo maker that have made logo making extremely easy for anyone without skills (Again, you’re welcome). So here’s the bottom line… I know Fiverr is the best platform for beginners, but because of that there are so many beginners that you will struggle. Just think about it… in websites such as Upworok, you are screened before entering the platform.  Almost anyone from anywhere around the world can join Fiverr. So here’s what I suggest, If you are really good at something… you’re gonna succeed. But if you’re just starting out or learning (which is completely okay), suggest you do what I did. I learned everyday.  I made freelancing my passion and I never paid a single penny to learn… no courses or anything like that (so now you know this isn’t a marketing answer lol) but I watched YouTube videos, researched on Google and read success stories. I learned new writing techniques, gimmicks and styles from the internet daily. I read tons of books and learned how to make my writings more attractive. Only because of that, I was able to succeed. Other beginners started maybe with a perfect profile but never improved… so they got stuck. As you learn and improve… you’re skills will sharpen and you will get more and more positive reviews, and therefore your pay will also increase.  If you’re a pro (or someone very qualified) you just have to be patient and work hard and realize that getting orders early is very rare on Fiverr… but not getting orders after you get a few 5 star reviews is rare.  So if you’re new… I suggest  You have a good gig description with zero errorsHave multiple gigsRespond to the 10 buyer requests everydayAdvertise on social media platformsNever give up and be patient!Now you know that it really is easy… and difficult at the same time! Good luck!  PS: I take hours of my time answering questions, trying to help fellow freelancers. If you found this answer helpful and want me to keep working hard, do upvote it, and for more daily valuable content hit the follow button on my profile!

It is actually not very hard if you are sure of what you are trying to achieve on Fiverr. Fiverr is the best platform to get started as a freelancer online. However, you need to be consistently working on Fiverr to grow. Here are the Top 7 things that you can do on Fiverr to be successful. Remember, these tips can be followed by all levels of Fiverr sellers, whether you are just starting or you are at higher levels. Fight the High Competition: Competition is high on Fiverr. You must be unique and putting in your best efforts to raise as the best seller.Fine Tune your Gigs: Keep checking your gigs and update them regularly so that more buyers get attracted to your gig.Prove your Mastery: Sell services that you are a master of. Prove your mastery through your work. Let the new buyer see your work on previously delivered previews. If you are a master, work will follow you.Be Patient: Nothing changes overnight. Keep patience. Keep doing the good work. Keep tweaking the gigs. Keep applying on buyer request and you will soon start earning more.Show Resilience: Not everything will go as per our plans. We must be resilient enough to accept the adversities and spring back.Promote your Gigs: Promote your gigs. The only way to sell more online is to promote. Keep promoting relentlessly.Own it and be Responsible: Selling on Fiverr is your Business. You must accept ownership and responsibilities of the outcome of your acts on Fiverr.I am sure these Top 7 Tips will help you succeed on Fiverr.
